ud5.3:6.5: anupubbiṃ kathaṃ → ānupubbīkathaṃ (bj) | anupubbīkathaṃ (si) | anupubbikathaṃ (s1-3, pts1, mr)
ud5.3:6.8: nekkhamme → nekkhamme ca (bj, s1-3) | nikkhame ca (pts1)
ud5.3:9.2: acirapakkantaṃ suppabuddhaṃ kuṭṭhiṃ → atha kho suppabuddhaṃ kuṭṭhiṃ acirapakkantaṃ (bj) | atha kho suppabuddhaṃ acirapakkantaṃ (si) | atha kho suppabuddhaṃ (pts1)
